Issue.creator: mastersingh24
Issue.summary: Limit the maximum number of concurrent streams/connections to the deliver service
Issue.description: Client applications make connections to the channel delivery service in order to receive the status of transactions they submit. Clients should not open multiple streams as a single steam can serve multiple transactions. In order to prevent issues caused by poorly written and/or malicious clients, the peer should provide a configuration setting to limit the total number of concurrent deliver streams.
